startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front. Feet together. Hands besides the buttocks. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Inhaling contract the muscle surrounding the right knee, drawing the right kneecap back towards the thigh.
Hold the contraction for 3 to 5 seconds.
Exhaling release the contraction such that kneecap returns to its normal position.

info: Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
